deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Function version returns uint depending on what version the contract is on
@dev function stake accepts an amount of bHOME to be staked and creates a new updateEvent for it
@dev function distribute accepts a wallet address and transfers the BaconCoin accrued to their wallet since the user's Last Distribution
@dev Function withdraw reduces the amount staked by a wallet by a given amount

distribute(address).details: function distribute accepts a wallet address and transfers the BaconCoin accrued to their wallet since the user's Last Distribution

initialize(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Function initialize replaces constructor in upgradable contracts   - Calls the init function of the inherited ERC777 contract

params._guardianAddress: The address Guardian receives Bacon distribution to
params._poolAddress: the address of Pool contracts approved to stake

stake(address,uint256).details: function stake accepts an amount of bHOME to be staked and creates a new updateEvent for it

version().details: Function version returns uint depending on what version the contract is on

withdraw(uint256).details: Function withdraw reduces the amount staked by a wallet by a given amount
